mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "officeId", a.supplier_name AS "supplierName", a.head_name AS "headName", a.phone AS "phone", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.email AS "email", a.fax AS "fax", a.wechat AS "wechat", a.qq AS "qq", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.bank_no AS "bankNo", a.bank_address AS "bankAddress", a.discount AS "discount", a.address AS "address", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_purchase_supplier( id, office_id, supplier_name, head_name, phone, mobile, email, fax, wechat, qq, bank_name, bank_no, bank_address, discount, address, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{officeId}, #{supplierName}, #{headName}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{fax}, #{wechat}, #{qq}, #{bankName}, #{bankNo}, #{bankAddress}, #{discount}, #{address}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
